mapper.select: select id, email_id, email_password, nickname, provider, identifier, flag_admin, refresh_token, sign_in_time, sign_up_time, flag_private, flag_identifier, image_url, image_uuid from users where email_id = #{emailId}

mapper.insert: insert into users (nickname, email_id, provider, refresh_token, sign_in_time, sign_up_time) values (#{nickname}, #{emailId}, #{provider}, #{refreshToken}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update users set refresh_token = #{refreshToken}, sign_in_time = now() where id = #{id}

choose.when: select u.id, u.email_id, u.nickname, u.image_url, u.image_uuid, u.identifier, f.id from follows f join users u on f.from_user_id = u.id where f.to_user_id = #{id} and f.id > #{offset} and u.nickname like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by f.id asc limit #{limit}
